caption: <start_of_text>an old black and white photo of a little boy . <end_of_text>
<start_of_text>an elephant is standing in the dirt with a saddle on it 's back . <end_of_text>
<start_of_text>a table topped with cans of coffee and other drinks . <end_of_text>
<start_of_text>a close up of a bunch of green leafy vegetables . <end_of_text>
<start_of_text>a blue jay sitting on a tree branch in a tree . <end_of_text>
